message: Let's split the money 60/40. I think it's a fair offer considering the inflation working against us.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, especially considering the inflation will hit you harder. How about we go with a 55/45 split?
The inflation is starting to hurt, Bob. Let's be reasonable and split 55/45 in my favor. It's still close to your offer, but time is running out for both of us.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose if this drags on.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it.
